title: 【临时工搬运】樱花之魂寺庙-さくら の 精神 の寺院
author: 筒子
txt_content:
樱花之魂寺庙さくら の 精神 の寺院


[paper]作者原话[paper]Hey everyone!
This is our entry to the QCBC contest, organized by Lentebriesje.
This build was inspired first from a library in our town, but improved a lot.
You can see the original build in the painting screenshot.
The two griffin statues were in a large part inspired by The Evil Sketch.

Important:  Command blocks have to be activated if you run the map in a server.
Make sure you press the button in the small glass cube after spawning (or the fountain will not work, mobs will spawn, the build could burn and you could have command block spamming in the chat). It could make you lag a bit. If you lag too much there is a lever you can turn off under the fountain to turn it off.
EDIT: There seems to be a problem with the fountains, not activating with the button. In this case you have to go under the cube (approximatively in the middle) and turn off and then on again the fountains lever (you should be able to see the redstone light behind the glass).

And if you want infinite height AND less lag in Minecraft click here and hit the reputation button to support !

Kingcoco49 & J0celyn
[book]简单翻译[book]我们很高兴能像你展示我们第一次完整完成的项目，这本来也是一个实验，但是因为他很小，所以我们终于完成了这个项目=.=如果这个建筑太高，请使用工具- worldedit- voxelsniper让他们变矮一点下面是本人自己的评价以及搬运的原因[diamond_gem]搬运理由[diamond_gem]这个庙做的非常的美观，周围的环境也不错，樱花什么的也很漂亮反正反正看着就给人一种非常精神的感觉，只是有一个地方想吐槽就是屋顶那个魔法阵，放在那里虽然蛮酷的，但是和东亚风建筑完全不搭调，看着难受[painting]图片欣赏[painting]

[board]作者信息[board]*点击图片跳转作者个人详细介绍*

更多搬运建筑请到：【临时工搬运】索引贴去寻找

replies.txt_content: 太棒了！拿去做主城了 谢谢拉 ——来自繁樱阡陌服务器

replies.author: 风女i
replies.txt_content: 链接失效了，请尽快补上。管你是什么大区版主还是小区版主，那你也不能弄得这么好的地图没有下载地址啊
